In the Green Room getting ready to speak with the one and only Frank Abagnale
Tucson Tech: UA real-estate services startup wins major investment

Arizona has a prolific history of technology creation, however, it has never had its own early stage fund. We solved this problem by raising the Arizona Founders Fund. We are investing in AZ startups, connecting technology pioneers with portfolio companies, and creating new innovation networks.We work hard every day to help business pioneers get involved in the tech community, not to mention we meet and invest in AZ's next generation of world-class tech founders.AZ software companies are the real deal and they're not going away.  Feel free to reach out to us to learn more!

Kickstart's mission is to fund seed stage companies in the Mountain West by aligning technology creators, industry, entrepreneurs, and capital sources behind the funding and mentoring of seed investments. It is an innovative investment vehicle that aligns the interests of the key constituents of the venture ecosystem- Universities, Entrepreneurs, Angel Investors, Industry Partners, and Venture Capital. This unprecedented level of collaboration, network access and value-contribution from across the ecosystem makes Kickstart Seed Fund the ideal partner for Rocky Mountain tech start-ups.

Infusionsoft is the only all-in-one sales and marketing software for small business that combines social networking, CRM, marketing automation, and eCommerce into into a single, well-oiled machine that automatically converts leads into new customers and grows sales from existing ones.More than 12,000 businesses around the world harness the power of Infusionsoft’s marketing automation software to streamline their sales and marketing processes. Headquartered in Chandler, Arizona, Infusionsoft is a privately held, four-time Inc. 500/5000 company funded by Mohr Davidow Ventures, vSpring Capital, and Goldman Sachs.I work exclusively on frontier and strategic projects with Sam Blackham (Interim CFO), Hal Halladay (SVP Corporate Development), and Clate Mask (CEO)

Contributed in the Senior Associate role to vSpring Capital, a Utah based early-stage venture fund with over $440 million of assets under management. It targets life sciences, consumer internet, and informational technology companies targeted in the Rocky Mountain and Intermountain West Region.
At vSpring - a venture capital fund with $390m under management - I am participating in due diligence, deal sourcing, and portfolio company support.

November 24, 2009, Scott and Ruminder (Romi) were students together

From my first days studying at Thunderbird, I was struck by Ruminder’s confident and insightful contributions to class discussion, consistent professionalism, and strong relationship-building skills. I had the privilege to work with Ruminder in a small group setting at Thunderbird. Ruminder’s commitment to the project, innovative skills, global acumen, and analytical skills allowed the collaboration to exceed expectations. Ruminder has strong leadership skills. He has the ability to focus the attention of everyone on the team on the goal and inspire them to contribute to reaching that goal.  Ruminder is successful at anything he strives to do. Those who work with him benefit from his determination to succeed. His creativity, commitment, and intellect are exceptional. I would consider myself fortunate to have the opportunity to work with him again in the future.

Greg Wilson
Acquisition Associate at Schulte Hospitality
December 22, 2011, Ruminder (Romi) was a client of Greg’s

I had the pleasure of managing and mentoring Greg while he was an intern with Kickstart Seed Fund, a Salt Lake City-based seed fund, during the Fall 2011, where his duties included participating on the Kickstart Seed Fund's due diligence team and participating in deal sourcing initiatives. During the internship, Greg demonstrated outstanding critical thinking skills in his analysis of an early-stage waste-to-energycompany that that Kickstart was contemplating an investing in. After two months of research, Greg and his team delivered a succinct, clearly articulated presentation to the investment committee that highlighted the trends, pros, cons, and potential risks for the deal. This presentation was a core piece of our investment decision; so much so that it clarified our investment thesis and cleared our questions about the space in question. I fully endorse Greg's ability to work effectively in a team setting, provide insights, and deliver rigorous analysis in a timely fashion. He will be a valuable addition to any organization.
